## Phase Overview

This issue tracks Phase 5 of the VR4DEAF repository migration plan: updating all references, deployment configurations, and package metadata throughout the codebase.

**Related Documentation**: `MIGRATION_PLAN.md`

## Objectives

- [ ] Update package.json files
- [ ] Update deployment configurations
- [ ] Update documentation links
- [ ] Update external references
- [ ] Update internal references
- [ ] Update branding and metadata
- [ ] Create redirect pages
